data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
There was two possible choices for the module name:

    Language::Prolog::XSB Language::XSB

    I prefer the second one because:

    - XSB is based in Prolog but is not strictly Prolog and XSB authors
    don't like to have XSB referred as a Prolog system. -
    Language::Prolog::XSB is too long, and as the module itself has
    other nested packages inside, their names become even longer.

    - I don't think Language::XSB could collide with any other module.

    - Salva
